infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to capture photos of civic issues.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to microphone to record audio descriptions of issues.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs location access to automatically tag the location of reported issues.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow CivicReport to access your camera to capture photos of civic issues.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow CivicReport to use your location to automatically tag reported issues.

plugins.microphonePermission: Allow CivicReport to access your microphone to record audio descriptions.
